author: Jules G
text: Demand @Comcast CEO drop unfair data caps and fees for good, for ALL customers. https://t.co/oPDoOpiUzI

author: Jules G
text: Demand @progressive and @GEICO stop using education level and occupation in rate-setting! Sign @CRAdvocacy petition to stop this discriminatory practice. https://t.co/vdobEOSn83

author: Jules G
text: Sign the petition to the Senate to convict Trump and ensure he can NEVER hold federal office again: https://t.co/Wx4TqUOMWg

author: Jules G
text: #WTFee, @comcast?! Sign @CRAdvocacy petition to stop Comcast’s data cap and overage fees during COVID-19. https://t.co/qFQsydwshV

author: Jules G
text: Tell your members of Congress you want to #RemoveTrumpNow. Democrats and Republicans, House and Senate -- all need to hear from you. Click here for phone numbers and a script. https://t.co/9CLPoRpjOT

author: Jules G
text: Join @MomsRising in urging Congress to impeach Trump and for the @VP & Cabinet to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove him from office. #RemoveTrumpNow https://t.co/ksdiZpH35b

author: Jules G
text: Join @MomsRising in urging Congress to impeach Trump and for the @VP & Cabinet to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove him from office. #RemoveTrumpNow https://t.co/AQ9GSPtocp

author: Jules G
text:
Congress must impeach and remove President Trump from office. And every GOP member of Congress who tried to overturn the election must be held accountable.

Add your name to the @jewishaction petition calling for immediate action: https://t.co/yinx53MSjL

author: Jules G
text: Former Obama national security official @brhodes says, "If you don't impeach and remove a President for staging a coup, what's the point of impeachment." Sign our petition calling for impeachment and to #RemoveTrumpNow: https://t.co/R6GgHbKe4Q

author: Jules G
text: Former Obama national security official @brhodes says, "If you don't impeach and remove a President for staging a coup, what's the point of impeachment." Sign our petition calling for impeachment and to #RemoveTrumpNow: https://t.co/YvlhxnSxe4

author: Jules G
text: I just signed a @commoncause petition: Stop Trump’s last-ditch attack on our democracy. Sign here: https://t.co/3awqhXWRvG

author: Jules G
text: Tell Your Senators: No Supreme Court nominee until after the inauguration https://t.co/Jes7eV9GME

author: Jules G
text: This cause is close to my heart - please sign: https://t.co/4rLZLj6xUC

author: Jules G
text: Thank you @SenatorShaheen for stopping the 2019 Medicare Health Insurance Tax and lowering Medicare Advantage Premiums. Now it's time to stop the 2020 Medicare Health Insurance Tax. #NoMedicare2020HIT
